extendedInfo.description: Best PDF Cutter!BEFORE USING THIS, MAKE SURE THAT UR PDF IS NOT PROTECTED.Problem with attaching large PDF's in mail? Want to extract important pages from huge PDF?Here is the solution!Now easily extract one or more pages from PDF.Split the PDF into multiple parts at user defined positions.Works with password protected PDF's as well.*****PLEASE UNLOCK THE PDF BEOFRE USING IT*****Do i need internet connection to create PDF?No, Application doesn't use servers to extract or split PDF.Processing takes place in your device.Does this take phone memory?No, the Application gets installed in your SDCARDGenerally this app works fine for most of the devices, butif you face any issues/difficulties while using app, kindly drop mail to androidpdflock@gmail.comI will do my best to resolve your issues as soon as possible.If you put only comment, there is no way for me to get back to you.How to use- Long click on file name to get the options- Select the option                      - Enter the comma seperated values in place of page numbers   ex. 5,10-15,20- Enter the output filename and click OK button- Output file will go in user defined directory- Click on the file name to open it (need appropriate reader software)- User friendly file browser interface- Only PDF files will be displayedNote: Best suited for 320x480 pixel resolution.Screen may get distorted at other resolutions.Keywords:PDF, Portable document format, extract, split, fast, free, simple, document, cutter, password, part

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work for me!
reviews.comment: Trying to split a 40MB,  1000 page PDF almost in half. I have also tried EXTRACTing the pages I need from it. In both cases the app stopped / crashed.
reviews.author: Paul Broadwith

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Interface is good (but could be better) and also needed to do other things with my document so would benefit from a one app does all!

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work with large files. Just stops working and automatically closes. Maybe 8t would work with small files.
reviews.author: Rebecca C

reviews.title: GREAT APP!!!!
reviews.comment: This is a wonderful app, the only app that I found who could extract pages from my 200+ page PDF. Must have for anyone who annotates or uses very large documents that they want to extract pages from. Wish that I didn\'t have to go back and forth between PDF and app, but it\'s a small thing that I can ignore.
